level.heading: Licensing and taxation.
level.text: Except as provided by 19 U.S.C. §§ 81a-81u, or by other Federal or District law, all activities and entities operating within a foreign trade zone that is established within the District of Columbia shall be subject to all applicable District licenses, permits, and taxation.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-28
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-28, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 36-501.
